Description: Miniature pottery bottle(?); mid-grey clay with abundant fine mica, grits and black particles; tall neck, now missing; squat lentoid body with podium foot; carination very chipped (three major chips); two letters of a graffito on upper wall, alpha and lambda.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IB.102)
